011818d5-aead-49d8-aca6-50a33cb88e96.description:
Connect any logic input to this block to start and stop the racers remotely. 
 Press 'E' (interact) on object to view various race settings
011818d5-aead-49d8-aca6-50a33cb88e96.title: SMAR Race Control

42dd8836-3cbb-495c-86b4-44fb9c9916b3.description:
SMAR Engine - Connect Driver to this block and connect this block to wheel bearings. Can be placed anywhere. 
 Paint Black, grey, light grey, or white To change engine speeds from slowest to fastest.
42dd8836-3cbb-495c-86b4-44fb9c9916b3.title: SMAR Engine

5d8f2445-31bb-4079-94ab-dc1df1e6e3ed.description: Scans and attempts to generate a racing line for Auto Racers. Place at start/finish line with target/screen facing the desired circut direciton
5d8f2445-31bb-4079-94ab-dc1df1e6e3ed.title: SMAR Track Generator

645fe8aa-2c33-43c9-8859-f6a03374c62a.description:
BETA: 
  Press 'Q' While holding to open up Race Control UI. 
 Press 'E' or 'ESC' to exit (Race Control must be placed down)
645fe8aa-2c33-43c9-8859-f6a03374c62a.title: SMAR Race Controller Tool

b20d3826-3235-459c-a4c9-ef1438caaed9.description: Connect Driver block to this and then connect this to brake lights (only braking)
b20d3826-3235-459c-a4c9-ef1438caaed9.title: Brake Light Control Unit

fbc31377-6081-426d-b518-f676840c407c.description:
Car AI Driver, connect to steering bearings and SMAR Engine. Place anywhere on car with steering wheel (smooth face) facing the front. 
 MUST BE PLACED WHILE CAR IS ON LIFT IN ORDER FOR CAR TO BE SCANNED CORRECTLY.
fbc31377-6081-426d-b518-f676840c407c.title: SMAR Driver

9f5ce20a-b774-4df9-9b6a-d1993c705138.description:
Saves Track as a blueprint for later use. 
 Place down on memorable spot (like back corner of start/finish line). Make sure you place it down on a separate block so it can become a floating obj. 
 Press 'E' To save the track to the block and blueprint. Save block on lift.
9f5ce20a-b774-4df9-9b6a-d1993c705138.title: SMAR Track Loader
